MACHINE ∩ MAN

2021. A 250-page narrative encapsulating themes of technology, artificial intelligence, agency, language, consumerism, and more through iterative, hypnotic, and textural visuals. The evil megacorporation "Machinism Industries" has plans to take over the world. Following a character's journey after purchasing a mass-marketed neural chip, the narrative depicts a removal of the decision-making process, and eventually, a corporeal takeover system, which is used to build a cyborg army. Part 2 is continued in the full 500-page PDF (definitely view it in two-up facing view!), where color is introduced, and the character experiences a full transformation. The book is coptic bound with laser-engraved anodized aluminum covers.
